properties.headline: Police operation - Friday 12 June - SYDNEY CBD Bathurst St, Kent St
properties.publicTransport:
Light rail services have again stopped running between Central and Circular Quay until 8.30pm approximately.

Bus services in the CBD may experience some delays while road closures are in place. Check transportnsw.info for service alerts.
properties.otherAdvice:
Currently Bathurst St is closed from Kent St to George St, but motorists travelling north on George St can turn right to go east on Bathurst St.

Road closures are in place until approximately 10pm on Bathurst St between Sussex St and George St, Day St between Harbour St and Bathurst St, Kent St between Liverpool St and Druitt St and on Druitt Ln.

Motorists are advised to avoid travelling through the CBD or allow plenty of extra travel time.

arrangementElements.html:
SYDNEY CBD 

3:30PM UNTIL 10PM APPROXIMATELY

  • Bathurst St between Sussex St and George St
  • Day St between Harbour St and Bathurst St
  • Druitt Lane between Sussex St and Kent St
  • Kent St* between Liverpool St and Druitt St

*Police will provide managed exit to vehicles from carparks.
arrangementElements.title: Road Closures

properties.diversions:
Motorists travelling northbound to the Sydney Harbour Bridge should use Harbour St, Clarence St or Cahill Exp due to closures on Kent St.

Motorists travelling citybound on the Western Distributor should use the King St off-ramp due to closures on Bathurst St.
